domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @Surgeon_General @WhiteHouse Why do you guys bring colour into everything in America? I’m so glad I’m not an American, wld have denounced. This must be soul crushing for black Americans being judged harshly for everything even for #covid19 that doesn’t even discriminate. This should’ve been a general advice
